dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your conversations and performance

conversations.title: Conversations
conversations.subtitle: Manage and monitor your customer conversations

channels.title: Channels
channels.addFirst: Add a channel to start receiving conversations
channels.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this channel? All conversations will be lost.
channels.deleteConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete the channel and all its conversations.
channels.limitReached: Channel limit reached for this plan

reports.title: Reports
reports.subtitle: Analytics and performance metrics
reports.comingSoonDescription: View detailed analytics, trends, and performance reports here.

settings.title: AI Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your AI assistant behavior and knowledge
settings.selectOrgDescription: Use the organization selector in the sidebar to configure AI settings.

modelConfig.title: AI Model Configuration
modelConfig.description: Technical parameters that control AI behavior and costs
modelConfig.modelDescription: The AI model used for generating responses
modelConfig.temperatureDescription: Lower = more focused and deterministic. Higher = more creative and varied.
modelConfig.maxTokensDescription: Maximum tokens per AI response (1 token ≈ 4 characters)

systemPrompt.title: Agent Instructions
systemPrompt.description: Define how your AI assistant behaves, its personality, and rules
systemPrompt.placeholder: You are a helpful customer support assistant. Be friendly, professional, and answer questions about our products and services. If you don't know the answer, offer to connect the visitor with a human agent.

agentInstructions.legacyWarning: You have a previous system prompt that is still active. Fill in the structured fields below and save to migrate to the new format.
agentInstructions.agentNameHint: The name your AI agent will use when interacting with visitors
agentInstructions.rolePlaceholder: You are a helpful assistant for a law firm specializing in immigration services...
agentInstructions.roleHint: Describe who the agent should be and what it does
agentInstructions.rulePlaceholder: Type a rule and press Enter or click Add...
agentInstructions.rulesHint: {count}/50 rules — define what the agent should and should not do
agentInstructions.personalityPlaceholder: e.g., Professional and friendly, speaks with confidence, uses simple language
agentInstructions.personalityHint: Describe the agent's tone and character — for behavioral constraints, use Rules above
agentInstructions.additionalInstructionsDescription: Optional — use this for business-specific rules or context that doesn't fit in the structured fields above. The main instructions are defined by the fields above.
agentInstructions.additionalInstructionsPlaceholder: Add any business-specific instructions that don't fit the fields above...

templates.selectDescription: Select a template to populate the fields. You can customize after applying.
templates.manageDescription: Create reusable templates for common business types
templates.templateNamePlaceholder: e.g., Law Firm, Restaurant, Medical Office
templates.templateDescriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of when to use this template
templates.templateNameExists: A template with this name already exists

handoff.title: Human Handoff
handoff.description: Keywords that trigger automatic transfer to a human agent
handoff.enterKeyword: Type a keyword and press Enter or click Add (max 20)

preview.title: AI Preview
preview.description: How your AI will respond based on current settings:
preview.question: What are your business hours?
preview.answer: Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EST. We're located in Miami, FL. Is there anything else I can help you with?

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.description: Information the AI uses to answer questions (RAG)
knowledge.dialogDescription: Add factual information for your AI to reference when answering visitor questions.
knowledge.contentPlaceholder: Enter the knowledge content that the AI should use to answer questions...
knowledge.emptyDescription: Add information about your business, services, FAQs, and pricing so the AI can provide accurate answers.
knowledge.editDialogDescription: Update the information for this knowledge item. The AI embedding will be regenerated automatically.
knowledge.categoryFreeTextDesc: Write custom information in your own words
knowledge.categoryBusinessHoursDesc: Define your weekly schedule and holidays

businessHours.title: Business Hours
businessHours.description: Set your business schedule so the AI can inform visitors about your availability
businessHours.dialogDescription: Define your weekly schedule, holidays, and timezone

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.description: Frequently asked questions so the AI can answer common inquiries
faqs.dialogDescription: Add question & answer pairs for your most common inquiries
faqs.answerPlaceholder: Type the answer to this question...
faqs.emptyDescription: Add frequently asked questions so the AI can provide quick, accurate answers.
faqs.deleteConfirmDescription: This question and answer will be removed.

pricing.title: Pricing & Services
pricing.description: Services and pricing so the AI can inform visitors about costs
pricing.dialogDescription: Add your services with prices so the AI can answer pricing questions
pricing.emptyDescription: Add your services and pricing so the AI can provide accurate cost information.
pricing.notesPlaceholder: e.g. Prices may vary by location. Tax not included.
pricing.deleteConfirmDescription: This service entry will be removed.

locationContact.title: Location & Contact
locationContact.description: Address and contact details so the AI can help visitors find and reach you
locationContact.dialogDescription: Add your business address, phone, email, and social media
locationContact.emptyDescription: Add your business location and contact details so the AI can help visitors find you.

policies.title: Policies
policies.description: Business policies so the AI can inform visitors about your terms
policies.dialogDescription: Add policies like cancellation, refunds, or privacy terms
policies.emptyDescription: Add business policies so the AI can provide accurate answers about your terms and conditions.
policies.deleteConfirmDescription: This policy entry will be removed.

apiKey.title: Custom OpenAI Key
apiKey.description: Optional: use a separate API key for this organization
apiKey.helpText: Leave empty to use the global platform key. Only set this if this organization uses their own OpenAI account.

widgetAppearance.title: Widget Appearance
widgetAppearance.description: Customize how your chat widget looks on your website
widgetAppearance.noChannelDescription: Create a website channel first to customize the widget appearance.
widgetAppearance.sectionTextsHint: Leave empty to use the widget's built-in bilingual defaults
widgetAppearance.headerTitleHint: Leave empty to use the widget's default text
widgetAppearance.headerSubtitleHint: Leave empty to use the widget's default text
widgetAppearance.resetConfirmDescription: All customizations will be reverted to the default values.
widgetAppearance.embedDescription: Copy and paste this snippet into your website's HTML

postChat.title: Post-Chat Experience
postChat.description: Configure what happens when visitors end a conversation
postChat.noChannelDescription: Create a website channel first to configure post-chat settings.
postChat.sectionFeaturesHint: Choose what to offer visitors after they end a conversation
postChat.enableTranscriptHint: Ask visitors if they want to receive the conversation by email
postChat.enableRatingHint: Show a quick satisfaction rating when the conversation ends
postChat.ccEmailHint: Your team receives a copy of every transcript sent
postChat.sectionLogoHint: Upload your logo to personalize the email template (recommended: 200x60px, PNG or SVG)
postChat.sectionTemplateHint: Customize the transcript email your visitors receive
postChat.emailClosingPlaceholderEn: Thank you for chatting with us!
postChat.resetConfirmDescription: All customizations will be reverted to the default values.

auth.title: Welcome back
auth.subtitle: Sign in to your ChatFlow360 dashboard

branding.headline: Get ChatFlow360, and Turn Traffic into Leads
branding.subheadline: The easiest way to run ChatFlow360, an AI-powered live chat for bilingual WordPress. Always on, designed to engage visitors in real-time across languages.

errors.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.
errors.updateFailed: Failed to update password. Please try again.

success.resetEmailSent: If an account exists with this email, you will receive a password reset link.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link

organizations.title: Organizations
organizations.subtitle: Manage all organizations on the platform
organizations.name: Organization Name
organizations.createFirst: Create your first organization to get started
organizations.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this organization? This action cannot be undone.
organizations.deleteConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete the organization and all its data.

users.title: Users
users.subtitle: Manage all users on the platform
users.makeSuperAdminHint: Full platform access — no organization needed
users.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.
users.deleteConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the user from the platform.

errors.slugExists: This slug is already in use.
errors.orgHasMembers: Remove all members before deleting this organization.
errors.emailExists: A user with this email already exists.
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.
errors.channelLimitReached: Channel limit reached for this plan.
errors.unauthorized: You don't have permission to perform this action.

promptTemplates.title: Prompt Templates
promptTemplates.subtitle: Create reusable templates for common business types
promptTemplates.name: Name
promptTemplates.createFirst: Create your first template to help organizations quickly set up their AI agents
promptTemplates.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this template? This action cannot be undone.
promptTemplates.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The template will be permanently removed.

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.subtitle: Manage platform-level API keys for AI services

openaiKey.title: OpenAI API Key
openaiKey.description: Global API key used as default for all organizations
openaiKey.helpText: This key is encrypted and used as the default for organizations without a custom key.
